sentences.sContent: There are two major political parties in the US.
The government’s major concern is with preventing road accidents.
sentences.sCn: 政府关注的大事是预防道路交通事故。

sentences.sContent: Smoking is one of the major causes of cancer.
sentences.sCn: 吸烟是引发癌症的元凶之一。

sentences.sContent: the major developments in computer technology
sentences.sCn: 计算机技术的重大进步

sentences.sContent: He’s majoring in Political Science.

...Mount Huang is one of the major tourist destinations in china...

trans.tranOther: very large or important, when compared to other things or people of a similar kind
to study something as your main subject at college or university
